name: lastfm-advanced-statistics
description: An application that provides more detailed last.fm scrobbling statistics

scripts.compile: npm run lint && npx tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.compile-tests: npm run lint-tests && npx rimraf ./compiledJsForTests && npx tsc --project tsconfig.tests.json
scripts.create-bundle: npm run clean-dist && npm run compile && npx webpack
scripts.serve: npm run create-bundle && npm run start-server
